channel.title: Help With enviromental variables.. again
channel.description: Can someone reply with their classpath and path so i can run a 508 source, When i run it says system cannot find the path specified and more question i'm using berkyscape do i have to edit what's inside of run?

item.title: Help With enviromental variables.. again
item.dc:creator: @owna_lune owna lune
item.description:
@owna_lune wrote:

… right click run.bat & click edit then change ur jdk version to what u have like its usualy

“C:\Program Files\Java\jdk1.6.0_0.6\bin\java.exe” net/com/espeon/Server 43594

change 0.6 to
jdk1.6.0_12\bin\java.exe etc

avoid the espeon thats what source i have

Read full topic
